title: Looking To Create A Chill Fun/Serious Team!
body:
Hey all,

I'm looking to form a team for any kind of players out there! New players unranked or ranked! 

You don't require any special things to be able to join! If you are willing to have fun play to win and have an overall good time! 

If interested leave a comment or add me SnakeWithACake!

Peace :)

replies.body:
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/

Here's where you can find players for your team.
I'm new to this site so I don't know how to function it >.>
